## TreeView.renderCollapsedNodes property

/\*\* When true, the control will be appear expanded by user interaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
renderCollapsedNodes: boolean;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: render-collapsed-nodes
